author: Phil Vickery
method: Melt the caster sugar in a frying pan until it turns golden or reaches 300C/570F on a sugar thermometer - take care here as the sugar will be very hot. Add the almonds and lemon juice, stir well and then spoon onto a silicon-lined baking sheet.  Leave to cool and then cut into wedges with a sharp knife. Serve piled high in a small bowl.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz caster sugar,  50g/1¾oz toasted flaked almonds,  squeeze lemon juice
